headline: Apollo Global Management, Inc. (APO) Introduces Apollo Sports Capital (ASC)
summary: With significant upside potential, Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE:APO) secures a spot on our list of the 13 Best Quality Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On September 29, 2025, Apollo Sports Capital (ASC), a new investment division devoted to funding prospects in the international sports and live events industry, was introduced by Apollo […]

headline: Exclusive-Yahoo nears deal to sell AOL to Italy's Bending Spoons for $1.4 billion, sources say
summary: New York (Reuters) -Yahoo is in advanced talks to sell AOL to Italian technology company Bending Spoons for about $1.4 billion, four sources familiar with the matter said, as the Apollo Global Management-backed firm sheds one of the most recognizable names of the early internet era.  The Milan-based app developer is in advanced talks to purchase the legacy media brand, the sources said.  The sources requested anonymity to discuss confidential negotiations.

headline: Apollo Trading 'Billions of Capital' in Secondary Market
summary: Apollo Global Management's Natalia Tsitoura comments on access to private markets. Speaking during a panel discussion at Bloomberg's Women, Money & Power event in London, she says her firm has already been trading billions of dollars of capital in the secondary market.

headline: PK AirFinance Issues $827 Million Aviation Loan ABS
summary: Brings PK’s Cumulative ABS Issuance to $2.8 Billion Since Program Inception in 2024NEW YORK, Oct. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PK AirFinance (“PK” or the “Company”), a leading aviation lending platform and affiliate of Apollo (NYSE: APO), has closed its second aircraft loan asset-backed securitization of 2025: PK ALIFT LOAN FUNDING 7 Series 2025-2 (“PKAIR 2025-2”). headline: Apollo Names Jaycee Pribulsky as Partner and Chief Sustainability Officer
summary: Pribulsky succeeds Dave Stangis, who will transition to a senior advisor role in 2026NEW YORK, Oct. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE: APO) today announced that Jaycee Pribulsky has been named Partner and Chief Sustainability Officer (CSO), effective October 1. Pribulsky will lead Apollo’s established sustainability strategy, which aims to strengthen long-term value creation and enhance risk management across the firm’s integrated investment platform.
